subtitle: We are working with Key Conservation to help conservationists gain critical funding and global support by making posts and profiles easy to access via links.
overview: Our team is working with KeyConservation to implement a new feature on their social media app. This feature involves generating a shareable link that directs a user to a specific campaign post or an organization's profile page. This will allow sharing of posts beyond the range of in-app users as well as help promote usage of the app.
title: Key Conservation: Linking
